price: それからわれら*は、彼らの後、（また）いくつもの別の世代を設けた。
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قُرُونًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qurūnan ākharīna
